nodes.text: The mother of the human Thara Nyende was a female individual who lived during the Imperial Era. In 2 ABY, Nyende, who lived on the manufacturing planet Sullust, enlisted in the Imperial Ninety-Seventh Stormtrooper Legion in order to financially support her mother as well as her uncle and cousins.
Thara Nyende's mother was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
